name: slox-matomo-ecomerce/slox-matomo-ecomerce
description: The SloxMatomoEcomerce plugin integrates Matomo (an open-source web analytics platform) with Shopware 6, providing comprehensive eCommerce tracking capabilities. This plugin allows shop owners to seamlessly track user interactions and gain valuable insights into their eCommerce performance.

description.de-DE: Das SloxMatomoEcomerce-Plugin integriert Matomo (eine Open-Source-Webanalyseplattform) mit Shopware 6 und bietet umfassende E-Commerce-Tracking-Funktionen. Dieses Plugin erm√∂glicht es Shop-Besitzern, Benutzerinteraktionen nahtlos zu verfolgen und wertvolle Einblicke in ihre E-Commerce-Leistung zu gewinnen.
description.en-GB: The SloxMatomoEcomerce plugin integrates Matomo (an open-source web analytics platform) with Shopware 6, providing comprehensive eCommerce tracking capabilities. This plugin allows shop owners to seamlessly track user interactions and gain valuable insights into their eCommerce performance.
